messages.subject: Sandra Dodd articles link
messages.msgSnippet: I ve read just about everything of her s I can get my hands on, It s too bad there s one less place her voice is being heard...BUT, I ve heard the new Live
messages.messageBody:
"I've read just about everything of her's I can get my hands on,"

It's too bad there's one less place her voice is being heard...BUT,
I've heard the new "Live Free, Learn Free" is a neat mag. Maybe
Shana (whom I belive is here) can give us the lowdown on the first
issue, for those of us that missed it.
Tell us more Shana! Who has articles in your first issue? Why don't
you post the link again and also add it to one of our categories in
the "files" section of this site.

For those of you that are newer to the list, please visit the actual
unschoolingbasics site. We have links to all sorts of great
unschooling resources in our "links" section.

Ren
